question: Will STRK be below $1 one day after airdrop?
description:
Starknet recently announced that they would be initiating an airdrop at 12 PM UTC on Feb 20, 2024. You can read about it here: https://medium.com/@StarknetFoundation/introducing-the-starknet-provisions-program-05d03ce13970.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Starknet Project's token ($STRK) is below $1.0000 (i.e. $0.9999 or less) 24 hours after token airdrop occurs. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

If STRK doesn't airdrop by December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to the top bracket (<$1).

The resolution source for this market will be the most liquid price source for STRK.

question: Will STRK be between $1.00 and $1.50 one day after airdrop?
description:
Starknet recently announced that they would be initiating an airdrop at 12 PM UTC on Feb 20, 2024. You can read about it here: https://medium.com/@StarknetFoundation/introducing-the-starknet-provisions-program-05d03ce13970

This market will resolve to "Yes" if Starknet Project's token ($STRK) is between $1.0000 (inclusive) and $1.5000 (exclusive) 24 hours after token airdrop occurs. Otherwise, the market will resolve to "No."

If STRK doesn't airdrop by December 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to the top bracket (<$1).

The resolution source for this market will be the most liquid price source for STRK.

question: Aleo airdrop by June 30?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if Aleo launches a token and announces they have performed an airdrop between February 13, 2024 and June 30, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

For the purposes of this market "locked" tokens or non-swappable tokens will not suffice to resolve this market to "Yes".

The primary resolution source for this market is on-chain information and official information from the Aleo team, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Biden declassify Russia security threat by Friday?
description:
On Wednesday, February 14, 2024, House Intelligence Committee Chair Mike Turner released intelligence around a serious national security threat to all members of the US Congress. As of the writing of this market, this information remains classified, though Turner is calling for its declassification.

This market will resolve to "Yes" if any part of the intelligence around the "serious national security threat" is declassified by Biden, his cabinet, or the White House in general, and made publicly available by Friday, February 16, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be information from the US government, however a consensus of credible reporting will also be used.

question: Will Google or NVIDIA be worth more on March 1?
description:
This market will resolve to "Google" if Alphabet (Google) is larger than NVIDIA as ranked by market capitalization as of market close on March 1. 
This market will resolve to "NVIDIA" if NVIDIA is larger than Alphabet (Google) on March 1.

If both have the exact same market cap, this market will resolve to 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be the NASDAQ.

question: Russian nuke in space by March 31?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Russian Federation places a nuclear weapon in space (an altitude of 50+ miles above sea level) by March 31, 2024, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.

question: Will the crypto market cap be less than 1.8 trillion on March 1?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the total crypto market cap is less than $1.8 trillion on March 1, 2024. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market is CoinGecko, specifically when the "7d" option is selected on the "Total Crypto Market Cap Chart" found here: https://www.coingecko.com/en/global-charts. The information for March 1, 2024 will be used once data is finalized for that day.

events.title: Total Crypto market cap on March 1?

question: Will WIF hit $1 by March 15?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if $WIF reaches $1 or greater by March 15, 2024 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The primary resolution source for this market will be CoinGecko (https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/dogwifhat), specifically the all time high figure in this market's timeframe. If CoinGecko becomes unavailable or fails to update, a consensus of highly liquid sources will be used instead.
